message:
Hi, Geeks , i would like to ask about GPU video encoding using none maxwell ,or kepler architecture i have to CUDA SDK , 
"device nvidia quadro 6000 " ,  so any tool , repository , paid software will be appreciated

data.message:
your question caught my attention while i am not in the video market but i started doing some research and read about it ,as far as i see fermi support in the NVENC "SDK" is not availble , and no one from the open source community is going for implementing cuda encoding for HA for that matter because of the hardware limitation is not cross compatible so the work is doubled or tripled for that matter to support each system , as i understood from your replay that you have fermi gpu farm while its not using HA but if its working dont fix it , but since you posted this question which mean you are not comfortable with your current situation you have 3 option 
1- upgrade your cards 
2- move to cloud and use CPU assistance which from what i read is far better than GPU 
3- ask some one to program a patch for you "not recommended" because the encoder is not supporting fermi anyway and it will all turn back to using CPU assistance or some other hack .
*btw thanks for making me read about this subject
